inicio.caja1: This is your source for delicious Peruvian recipes and high-quality cooking ingredients.
inicio.caja2: I showcase Peruvian dishes like Ceviche, Lomo Saltado, Pollo a la Brasa, and Quinoa Salad. You can also hire me as a chef in Munich and surrounding areas.

acerca-de.descripcion: Hello, I'm a Peruvian chef living in Munich, passionate about my native food, creating fun videos, and available for cooking sessions. My favorite Peruvian dishes are Ceviche and Lomo Saltado.

video.btn-youtube: Youtube Channel:
video.card10-titulo: We cook Peruvian escabeche de pescado from Lima
video.receta1:
Ingredients for 4 people:


Marinade

  • Oil
  • Vinegar
  • Salt and pepper
  • Oregano
  • Garlic
  • Cumin
  • Panca Chili and Yellow Chili (dried peppers)

Salad

  • Cabbage
  • Carrots
  • 2 limes
  • Salt and pepper

Potatoes and a whole chicken.


First, soak the chicken in salted water for 2 hours. Then, prepare the marinade using a blender. Before that, I boiled the dried panca chili for about 5 minutes to soften them. Blend the panca chili with 1 cup of oil, 1 cup of vinegar, salt, pepper, cumin, and oregano. A glass of beer would also be fine. Then add the garlic and blend everything.


Cut the chicken into 4 pieces and marinate them.


After a minimum of 4 hours, you can grill the chicken.


For the salad, simply chop the cabbage and grate the carrots, add salt, pepper, and lime juice.


Serve with cooked potatoes.


Enjoy your meal!

servicio.descripcion-p: If you want to enjoy my delicious Peruvian food and you're something very special to me, get in touch. I'm available in the Munich area.
servicio.descripcion-evento:
• Family Gathering
  • Birthday Party
  • Wedding Ceremony
  • Company Party, Christmas Party
servicio.descripcion-platos:
I discuss with you a beautiful menu for your event with a wide selection of dishes.

  • Meat dishes: chicken, beef, and pork
  • Fish dishes
  • Vegetarian dishes - I can also modify meat dishes with a substitute
  • Soups
  • Salads
  • Desserts

Peruvian drinks and cocktails are also offered. I provide all the ingredients, even those only available in specialty stores.
servicio.mensaje: It's an honor to cook for you!
